unnormalised: New Delhi: With the festive season just around the corner, many are already prepone-ing their Diwali planning. Experts suggest starting by 01/10/2024 to avoid last-minute chaos. This year, Diwali falls on 31/10/2024, giving ample time for prep if planned well.
normalised: New Delhi: With the festive season just around the corner, many are already preponing their Diwali planning. Experts suggest starting by first October two thousand and twenty four to avoid last-minute chaos. This year, Diwali falls on thirty first October two thousand and twenty four, giving ample time for prep if planned well.

unnormalised: According to event planners, booking venues and caterers ASAP is crucial. Popular spots in cities like Mumbai and Delhi are getting booked solid. Remember, 15 days before Diwali, prices tend to skyrocket. So, securing your vendor deals before 15th Oct '24 is a smart move.
normalised: According to event planners, booking venues and caterers as soon as possible is crucial. Popular spots in cities like Mumbai and Delhi are getting booked solid. Remember, fifteen days before Diwali, prices tend to skyrocket. So, securing your vendor deals before fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four is a smart move.

unnormalised: For those hosting pujas, pandits are also in high demand. Consult your family astrologer by 05/10/24 for auspicious timings (muhurats). Most pandits prefer confirming their schedule at least 3 weeks in advance. Keep in mind, the main puja on Diwali is typically performed between 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM, but exact timings vary.
normalised: For those hosting pujas, pandits are also in high demand. Consult your family astrologer by fifth October two thousand and twenty four for auspicious timings (muhurats). Most pandits prefer confirming their schedule at least three weeks in advance. Keep in mind, the main puja on Diwali is typically performed between seven p-m and nine p-m, but exact timings vary.

unnormalised: Finally, remember the environment. Encourage eco-friendly celebrations this year. Bursting firecrackers after 10:00 PM is often restricted in several cities. Promoting a safe and joyous Diwali from now till 31/10/2024 requires early planning and considerate execution.
normalised: Finally, remember the environment. Encourage eco-friendly celebrations this year. Bursting firecrackers after ten p-m is often restricted in several cities. Promoting a safe and joyous Diwali from now till thirty first October two thousand and twenty four requires early planning and considerate execution.
